name: Land Before Slimes
description:
Due to a bug the game does not work on directX graphics drivers. This will be fixed later this week/

Wow. a really cool game about Slimes. You are a slime, in the land of signs.

Just hang with the Signs, be a Slime.

//game was not fully finished due to what equates to a computer crash

Music by Jmas. [They've got twitter] https://twitter.com/JimmyMaslaki

Everything else by me AMDev. Support my work here at https://www.patreon.com/AMDev
